tool_description: Calculates quantitative alignment scores between project objectives and grant criteria, identifying areas of strong match and potential misalignment using weighted scoring algorithms.

criteria_weights.description: Importance weights for each criterion (must sum to 1.0)

scoring_method.description: Scoring algorithm: semantic, keyword, or hybrid

error_messages: Empty input arrays: Both project_objectives and grant_criteria must contain at least one item.
Weight mismatch: criteria_weights array length must match grant_criteria length if provided.
Invalid weights: criteria_weights must sum to 1.0 and all values must be positive.
Invalid scoring method: scoring_method must be one of [semantic, keyword, hybrid].
usage: Provide project_objectives and grant_criteria arrays. Optionally specify criteria_weights for prioritization and scoring_method for algorithm selection. Returns detailed alignment analysis.

criterion_scores.description: Individual scores for each grant criterion

confidence_score.description: Confidence in alignment assessment from 0 to 100
